name: Pan-Dimensional Conga Combat
description: Developed in a top secret lab over the course of the past eighteen months, RGCD.DEV's Pan-Dimensional Conga Combat is a rhythm-synchronised, old-school, score-chasing arcade game that plays like some alien coin-op from another dimension.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 1.5Ghz Dual Core Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GLES compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: GLES compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
